title: Blackjack Game
description: Simple blackjack game, built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

title: Jira Clone
description: Bootcamp group project. Full stack application built with React, JSON Server, and React Testing Library

title: Cohort Tools

title: Guria's Bakery
description: A small game where you play as Guria, a siamese cat, and have to catch all the ingredients in order to win the game.

title: Let Me Sing About It
description: A fun application where you can find multiple songs for a cool karaoke night with friends, family or even foe!
